Package GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence

Class Summary
ArtificialIntelligence Used as a template for the 3 different levels of artificial intelligence present in the game, which are composed by 2 fundamental methods: chasePlayer which tracks and follows the player, and move which specifies how the enemy behaves whether it is engaged in a chase or not.
ArtificialIntelligenceTest  
HighIntelligence Class used to establish the logic implemented by high intelligence enemies.
HighIntelligenceTest  
LowIntelligence Class used to establish the logic implemented by low intelligence enemies.
MediumIntelligence  
MediumIntelligenceTest  
Node Node object used to represent tiles in the graph that the high intelligence enemies use to determine the shortest path to the player.
PathFinder System used by the high intelligence enemies to calculate the shortest path between their location and the location of the player.
PathFinderTest
